frontmatter.title: In a lonely World ğŸ˜”
frontmatter.spoiler: Have you ever felt alone, its probably the worst feeling now imagine i have to be alone all the time, i mean i don't have real people to call friends sometimes I don't even get a text message from anyone it was worse last year when no one remembered my birthday so no one said happy birthday until the next day, have you ever felt forgotten.

frontmatter.title: Hello World ğŸ˜„
frontmatter.spoiler: Welcome this is literally the first post.If i were to write about myself or give myself a description I would say I am a 16 year who loves to transform ideas into reality using code. The path of a self-taught developer can be scary and intimidating. For me, getting into code turned out to be the right choice anyways: When the responsibility for your growth, career and learning sits 100% on your own shoulders, you also completely own your wins.
